questions.question: Event delegation is ________
questions.answer: Falling down to children elements from their parents in the DOM tree
options: Falling down to children elements from their parents in the DOM tree
Moving from children up to their parent in the DOM
adding an event listener to a selected element
Waiting for a DOM event to be triggered

Which is a characteristic of var when defining a variable
questions.answer: var is visible to all nested scopes in its definined scope
options: var is visible in its defined scope only
var is visible to all nested scopes in its definined scope
var works only when defined in block level scopes
